Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Addison/Long
ShortDescription: Eastbound #152 buses are temporarily rerouted via Addison, Central, Belmont, Laramie, and Addison, due to construction near Addison/Long.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #152 buses are temporarily rerouted via Addison, Central, Belmont, Laramie, and Addison, due to construction near Addison/Long.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
